description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老宋任穷之女，文化大革命期间北京著名红卫兵领袖，后入籍美国成为地质学者。
description.en: Daughter of the Communist Party of China elder Song Renqiong, a prominent Red Guard leader in Beijing during the Cultural Revolution, who later became a US citizen and geologist.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党元老，中国人民解放军开国上将。
description.en: An elder of the Communist Party of China and a founding general of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 宋任穷之妻，宋彬彬之母。
description.en: Wife of Song Renqiong and mother of Song Binbin.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国一场自1966年至1976年发生的全国性政治运动。
description.en: A nationwide political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命时期中国大陆的青年学生组成的群众性组织。
description.en: A mass organization of young students in mainland China during the Cultural Revolution.

zh-cn: 北京师范大学附属实验中学
en: The Experimental High School Attached to Beijing Normal University

description.zh-cn: 北京师范大学女附中党总支书记兼副校长，在文化大革命“红八月”期间被红卫兵批斗致死。
description.en: Party secretary and vice-principal of the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University, who was beaten to death by Red Guards during the "Red August" of the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月，北京的红卫兵运动进入高潮，因暴力和破坏行为而著称。
description.en: In August 1966, the Red Guard movement in Beijing reached its peak, known for its violence and destructive activities.

description.zh-cn: 北京在1928年至1949年期间的名称。
description.en: The name of Beijing from 1928 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命初期，由刘少奇、邓小平主导，向北京各大中学校派出的领导运动的队伍，后被毛泽东批评并撤销。
description.en: Teams dispatched to major middle schools and universities in Beijing to lead the movement at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution, led by Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping. They were later criticized by Mao Zedong and withdrawn.

nodes.id: 北京师大女附中革命师生代表会

zh-cn: 北京师大女附中革命师生代表会

description.zh-cn: 文革初期在北京师大女附中成立的学生组织，在工作组领导下运作。
description.en: A student organization established at the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University in the early stages of the Cultural Revolution, operating under the leadership of a work group.

description.zh-cn: 1966年8月18日，毛泽东在天安门广场首次接见来自全国各地的红卫兵。
description.en: On August 18, 1966, Mao Zedong received Red Guards from all over the country for the first time in Tiananmen Square.

en: Hubei Provincial Committee of the Chinese Communist Party
Up to the Mountains and Down to the Countryside Movement

description.zh-cn: 学者，文革史研究者，其文章指控宋彬彬对卞仲耘之死负有责任。
description.en: A scholar and researcher of the Cultural Revolution history, whose articles accused Song Binbin of being responsible for the death of Bian Zhongyun.

description.zh-cn: 卞仲耘的丈夫。
description.en: Husband of Bian Zhongyun.

description.zh-cn: 刘仰峤之女，文革初期北师大女附中革命师生代表会主席。
description.en: Daughter of Liu Yangqiao, chairwoman of the Revolutionary Teachers and Students Representative Committee at the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University during the early Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬是宋任穷之女。
description.en: Song Binbin is the daughter of Song Renqiong.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬是锺月林之女。
description.en: Song Binbin is the daughter of Zhong Yuelin.

description.zh-cn: 刘进是刘仰峤之女。
description.en: Liu Jin is the daughter of Liu Yangqiao.

description.zh-cn: 王晶垚是卞仲耘的丈夫。
description.en: Wang Jingyao is the husband of Bian Zhongyun.

relationships.target: 北京师范大学附属实验中学

description.zh-cn: 在北京“红八月”期间，北京师范大学女附中副校长卞仲耘被该校红卫兵批斗致死。
description.en: During the "Red August" in Beijing, Bian Zhongyun, the vice-principal of the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University, was beaten to death by Red Guards from the school.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬在“红八月”期间率领北京师范大学女附中的红卫兵打死了副校长卞仲耘。
description.en: During the "Red August", Song Binbin led Red Guards from the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University to beat vice-principal Bian Zhongyun to death.

description.zh-cn: 宋彬彬在文化大革命初期成为北京师范大学女附中的红卫兵领袖，并因给毛泽东佩戴袖章而闻名全国。
description.en: Song Binbin became a Red Guard leader at the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University at the beginning of the Cultural Revolution and became famous nationwide for putting an armband on Mao Zedong.

description.zh-cn: 批准成立文化大革命工作组并派往北京各学校。
description.en: Approved the establishment of Cultural Revolution work groups and dispatched them to schools in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 批准成立文化大革命工作组并派往北京各学校。
description.en: Approved the establishment of Cultural Revolution work groups and dispatched them to schools in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东批评刘少奇和邓小平派工作组的做法，导致工作组于1966年7月底被撤销。
description.en: Mao Zedong criticized Liu Shaoqi and Deng Xiaoping for dispatching work groups, leading to their withdrawal at the end of July 1966.

relationships.target: 北京师大女附中革命师生代表会

relationships.source: 北京师大女附中革命师生代表会

description.zh-cn: 北京师大女附中革命师生代表会在文化大革命工作组的领导下成立并运作。
description.en: The Revolutionary Teachers and Students Representative Committee of the Girls' High School Attached to Beijing Normal University was established and operated under the leadership of the Cultural Revolution work group.

description.zh-cn: 在卞仲耘被打死当晚，宋彬彬等人向时任中共北京市委第二书记吴德报告了其死因。
description.en: On the night Bian Zhongyun was beaten to death, Song Binbin and others reported the cause of her death to Wu De, who was then the Second Secretary of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在天安门城楼上参加毛泽东接见红卫兵活动，并亲手为毛泽东戴上红卫兵袖章。
description.en: Participated in the event where Mao Zedong received Red Guards on the Tiananmen Rostrum and personally put a Red Guard armband on him.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东在得知宋彬彬的名字后说“要武嘛”，此后“宋要武”的名字闻名全国，深刻影响了宋彬彬的公众形象。
description.en: After learning Song Binbin's name, Mao Zedong said, "Be martial (要武嘛)." Subsequently, the name "Song Yaowu" became known nationwide, profoundly influencing Song Binbin's public image.

description.zh-cn: 1968年初，江青在一次大会上点名批评宋任穷，导致宋家失势并被批斗。
description.en: In early 1968, Jiang Qing criticized Song Renqiong by name at a large meeting, which led to the Song family's downfall and persecution.

description.zh-cn: 因父亲宋任穷被江青批评而受到牵连，与母亲一同被押至沈阳软禁。
description.en: Implicated by Jiang Qing's criticism of her father, Song Renqiong, she was taken to Shenyang and placed under house arrest with her mother.

description.zh-cn: 学者王友琴自1995年起发表多篇文章，指控宋彬彬是导致卞仲耘死亡的暴力事件的负责人。
description.en: Since 1995, scholar Wang Youqin has published several articles accusing Song Binbin of being responsible for the violent incident that led to Bian Zhongyun's death.

description.zh-cn: 卞仲耘的丈夫王晶垚认为宋彬彬是杀害其妻的红卫兵主要负责人，多次抗议学校将其评为荣誉校友，并于2014年拒绝接受宋彬彬的道歉，称其虚伪。
description.en: Wang Jingyao, the husband of Bian Zhongyun, considered Song Binbin a main person in charge of the Red Guards who killed his wife. He repeatedly protested the school's decision to honor her as an outstanding alumna and, in 2014, refused to accept her apology, calling it hypocritical.
